title: Ask Me! Colors and Shapes Free
creator: Eggroll Games

extendedInfo.description: Ask Me! Colors and Shapes encourages learning through narrated rhyme and hand-clapping music with over 100 cute and colorful items! Identify tons of candies, toys, foods, clothing, vehicles, animals and fun characters like Millie Monster and Silly Snake! =====================================* Helpful hints ensure frustration-free play.* Incorrect answers are simply removed to reinforce a positive learning experience.* Correct answers are rewarded with timed whack 'em games and balloon popping fun.* Parental controls allow you to turn off sounds, music, purchases and links to our other apps.* Eggroll Games are designed for kids and contain no ads.* Your privacy is important to us. We do not collect personal information from our users.====================================="This app is perfect for kids learning their shapes and colors. It has different learning modes, cute pictures, and fun music that I found myself even getting into!""Another great app from Eggroll Games. They just keep getting better and better. The music is so catchy and fun. My kids love playing it!""Love this game. It's simple and colorful. No ads, you can turn off in-app purchases and music. The best game!"=====================================Celebrating over 1,000,000 downloads, Eggroll Games builds interactive toys that promote learning and engage children through colorful interactivity without confusing buttons or menus. Find us on Facebook at facebook.com/eggrollgames, follow us on Twitter @eggrollgames or drop in for a visit at EggrollGames.com!Thank you for supporting us! reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: Ask Me is a wonderful app! A fun and educational way to capture the inquisitive nature of your toddler. Two thumbs up!!!
reviews.author: Scott Leftwich

reviews.title: Fun way to learn
reviews.comment: This is a great fun app for kids. The music is catchy for kids. Fun activities for kids. Graphics is very polished.
reviews.author: Marc Edward Dalmacio

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app for kids. Has a lot of different items.
reviews.author: Amanda Linn
